resources.string: " &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &nbsp &#34To create Techno-Managers for meeting current and future demands of the industry with emphasis on leadership qualities, social sensitivity and eye to grasp opportunity at global perspective &#34 "

Welcome to Govt. College Of Engineering and Technology, Bikaner, Approved by AICTE, MHRD, Govt. of India and Affiliated to Rajasthan Technical University (RTU) Kota, was established in the year 2007 with present intake of 420 students per year in B. Tech and 60 students per year in MBA. This College is running with the aim to equip students with the latest engineering skills and knowledge to successfully meet the challenges posed by globalization and to provide comprehensive engineering education and necessary technical skills by developing a professional outlook in every walk of life.
 

The college is a renowned institution in the field of Engineering and Management education. Result oriented committed approx. 120 Faculty Members, good Placement, cafeteria etc. are salient features of this college.
 

Faculty members of this esteemed institution are providing consultancy services to various industries. For overall academic development of faculty members, college has conducted short term courses on bio fuel, communication skills, mechatronics, entrepreneurship, Physical Fitness Camp, NITTTR, National Science Day, and National Workshop etc.

ABOUT COLLEGE

Judging by the date of establishing year, GCET is relatively a new arrival in the arena of technical institutions. It was established in 2007, as an autonomous body of Govt. of Rajasthan, amidst the brown blooms of desert island, Bikaner. It has made its mark by inspiring quality education. Total intake of College is 420 students in branches (CSE, ECE, EE, ME, CE, CRE) of Engineering and 60 students in MBA per year. To create Techno-Managers for meeting current and future demands of the industry with emphasis on leadership, social sensitivity and eye to grasp opportunity at global perspective.

OUR MISSION

"To create Techno-Managers for meeting current and future demands of the industry with emphasis on leadership qualities, social sensitivity and eye to grasp opportunity at global perspective"

OUR VISION

"To promote higher learning and research in the field of Engineering & Technology"

Bank & ATM In Campus :

Banking is possible in the college premises with The Oriental Bank of Commerce Branch, making banking procedure easy and convenient. A 24-hour ATM is situated on campus. Branch Name : Engineering College Bikaner

Branch Code: 1174

Address: Engineering College Bikaner, Pugal Road, Bikaner

Phone : +91-151-2253233

Fax : +91-151-2253233

E-Mail : bm1174@obc.co.in

Hostel

"AIMS and Objectives :"

• "To create an atmosphere of harmony and co-operation amongst the boarders."

•"To provide the boarders a peaceful and congenial environment to enable them to excel in their studies and personality development."

•"To create amongst the students, a sense of accommodation and to inculcate discipline."

• "To run and manage the hostel and it's Mess efficiently."


"The details regarding hostel may be collected from the office of the Chief warden."

Canteen



" A well maintained college canteen is operated by catering professionals. Students are offered a wide range of snacks, beverages, and a variety of dishes and meals (vegetarian only)."

Medical Facilities



"Medical care is provided by the Campus Medical Officers and regular health checkups are conducted. All necessary first-aid facilities are provided in the college campus itself. All the students and staff are taken care of their health in campus. The first aid box is available in the library as for the students with the campus medical officers always keen to help."

NATIONAL SERVICE SCEME



Introduction :

" Popularly known as NSS, the scheme was launched in Gandhiji's Centenary year, 1969. Aimed at developing student's personality through community service. NSS, is a voluntary association of young people in Colleges, Universities and at +2 level working for a campus-community linkage."

"The cardinal principle of the NSS programme is that it is organised by the students themselves, and both students and teachers through their combined participation in community service, get a sense of involvement in the tasks of nation building."

Objective behind NSS :

To enable the students to understand the community in which they work.

•"To understand themselves in relation to their community."
•"To identify the needs and problems in the community in the solution of which they can be involved."
•"To develop among themselves a sense of social and civic responsibility."
•"To apply their education in finding practical solution to individual and community problems."
•"To develop competence required for group living and sharing responsibilities."
•"Gain skills in mobilising community participation."
•"To acquire leadership qualities and democratic attitude."
•"To develop capacity to meet emergencies and national disasters."
•"To practice national integration."

N.S.S. Moto :

" The motto or watchword of the National Service Scheme is 'NOT ME BUT YOU'. This reflects the essence of democratic living and upholds the need for selfless service and appreciation of the other person's point of view and also to show consideration for fellow human beings. It underlines that the welfare of an individual is ultimately dependent on the welfare of society on the whole. Therefore, it should be the aim of the NSS to demonstrate this motto in its day-to-day programme."

N.S.S. Day :

" NSS was formally launched on 24th September, 1969, the birth centenary year of the Father of the Nation. Therefore, 24 September is celebrated every year as NSS Day with appropriate programmes and activities."

Contact Information:

"Mr. SHANKAR LAL SHARMA Coordinator-NSS Govt. College of Engineering & Technology"

NATIONAL CADET CORE

What is NCC :

"N.C.C. stands for "NATIONAL CADET CORPS". It is a non-political organization of national level which works with the aim of unity and discipline, and is related with defense department."

About Unit :

"N.C.C. unit has been started since 1976 in Danielson Degree College. N.C.C. is an armed students organization under defense ministry of India .This company of N.C.C. is working under '24 M.P. BN N.C.C. Chhindwara' whose Commanding officer is Lt.Col. S.N. Parihar. Group headquarter of N.C.C. is in Jabalpur and N.C.C. Directorate is in Bhopal, and main office of Director General N.C.C. is in New Delhi."

Session & Working :

"N.C.C. session starts from the month of August. Under N.C.C. training cadets get inspired by unity and discipline, patriotism, armed activities training of weapons, paragliding, tracking etc. Along with these they also get inspired to do social services like adult education, blood donation, leprosy-eradication and so on."

Contact Information:

"Dr. O. P. JAKHAR Coordinator-NCC Govt. College of Engineering & Technology"

Computer Centre


"The computer centre of GCET, Bikaner is under the administration of CSE department with all the necessary availabilities & work capability."

"The infrastructure consists of a computer block with nearly 10 different labs. With individual 20 students capacity per lab & personal assistance. The computer centre consists of the latest technology system with the following configurations as:"

• Processor :" i7, 3.4 GHz"
•RAM : "2GB, 1066MHz DDR3 RAM with 8GB Expandibility"
•Hard disk : "320GB"
•Screen : "18.5 inch. LED"

"In overall the computer centre has 200 systems approx. which is a part of 500 systems approx. in the college. College consists of Wifi campus."

Transportation

"As per the notification with reference F1(A2)/CET/Reg./2015/02 dated 10.09.2015, all the students and their parents are hereby informed that the institute is not providing any transport facility. If they are availing the facility of transport from any source, they will be solely responsible for any misshappen took place related to services taken by them. Please ensure the quality of the transport services they are availing for commuting."
